messages.msgSnippet: Could you send me the links to the ZOOM ideas?  I don t recall seeing it on the list.  We have a recycle bag and books filled with ideas.  Another site would
messages.messageBody:
Could you send me the links to the ZOOM ideas? I don't recall seeing it on
the list. We have a recycle bag and books filled with ideas. Another site
would be great. Thanks in advance, Erik
----- Original Message -----
From: <Pokerdog70@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 10:58 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Soda Bottles


> From: Pokerdog70@...
>
> Olivia,
> Thanks for posting the links to the Zoom ideas. We had just seen them
make
> the biodome this morning and we weren't paying close enough attention. Now
> we're going to make it!
> I'm glad to hear I'm not the only one with a "recycle" box. It's taking
> over my guest room even as we speak.....
> --Karen :)
>
> > Check it out!
> http://www.unschooling.com
>

messages.subject: Soda Bottles
messages.msgSnippet: Olivia, Thanks for posting the links to the Zoom ideas. We had just seen them make the biodome this morning and we weren t paying close enough attention. Now
messages.messageBody:
Olivia,
Thanks for posting the links to the Zoom ideas. We had just seen them make
the biodome this morning and we weren't paying close enough attention. Now
we're going to make it!
I'm glad to hear I'm not the only one with a "recycle" box. It's taking
over my guest room even as we speak.....
--Karen :)
